title: Ratchet
lyrics:
[Snippet 1]
Dance too much money in the pants
Dance too much money in the pants
Oh, ratchet sluts!
Hoe Face.....
[Snippet 2]
[...] ratchet!
Don't fuck that chick she's ratchet!
Now go home, now go home
Don't make me get my hatchet
I know you wanna smash it
Don't fuck that chick she's ratchet!
